resources.string: Welcome to Mad Libs! Always liked telling stories? Than this is a great chance for you! You are going to provide the words to complete a story, however, you won\'t be able to see the complete story until the madness is done! No way back…
Fill in the words to complete the story!

Tarzan always dresses in / shorts made from the skin of a/an / and his best friend is a/an / chimpanzee named Cheetah. He is supposed to be able to speak to elephants and / .
